label: uncl8155
comment: Code specifying the size and type of equipment.

values.label: Dime coated tank
values.comment: A tank coated with dime.

values.label: Epoxy coated tank
values.comment: A tank coated with epoxy.

values.label: Pressurized tank
values.comment: A tank capable of holding pressurized goods.

values.label: Refrigerated tank
values.comment: A tank capable of keeping goods refrigerated.

values.label: Stainless steel tank
values.comment: A tank made of stainless steel.

values.label: Nonworking reefer container 40 ft
values.comment: A 40 foot refrigerated container that is not actively controlling temperature of the product.

values.label: Trailer
values.comment: Non self-propelled vehicle designed for the carriage of cargo so that it can be towed by a motor vehicle.

values.label: Nonworking reefer container 20 ft
values.comment: A 20 foot refrigerated container that is not actively controlling temperature of the product.

values.label: Exchangeable pallet
values.comment: Standard pallet exchangeable following international convention.

values.label: Semi-trailer
values.comment: Non self propelled vehicle without front wheels designed for the carriage of cargo and provided with a kingpin.

values.label: Tank container 20 feet
values.comment: A tank container with a length of 20 feet.

values.label: Tank container 30 feet
values.comment: A tank container with a length of 30 feet.

values.label: Tank container 40 feet
values.comment: A tank container with a length of 40 feet.

values.label: Container IC 20 feet
values.comment: A container owned by InterContainer, a European railway subsidiary, with a length of 20 feet.

values.label: Container IC 30 feet
values.comment: A container owned by InterContainer, a European railway subsidiary, with a length of 30 feet.

values.label: Container IC 40 feet
values.comment: A container owned by InterContainer, a European railway subsidiary, with a length of 40 feet.

values.label: Refrigerated tank 20 feet
values.comment: A refrigerated tank with a length of 20 feet.

values.label: Refrigerated tank 30 feet
values.comment: A refrigerated tank with a length of 30 feet.

values.label: Refrigerated tank 40 feet
values.comment: A refrigerated tank with a length of 40 feet.

values.label: Tank container IC 20 feet
values.comment: A tank container owned by InterContainer, a European railway subsidiary, with a length of 20 feet.

values.label: Tank container IC 30 feet
values.comment: A tank container owned by InterContainer, a European railway subsidiary, with a length of 30 feet.

values.label: Tank container IC 40 feet
values.comment: A tank container, owned by InterContainer, a European railway subsidiary, with a length of 40 feet.

values.label: Refrigerated tank IC 20 feet
values.comment: A refrigerated tank owned by InterContainer, a European railway subsidiary, with a length of 20 feet.

values.label: Temperature controlled container 30 ft.
values.comment: Temperature controlled container measuring 30 feet.

values.label: Refrigerated tank IC 40 feet
values.comment: A refrigerated tank owned by InterContainer, a European railway subsidiary, with a length of 40 feet.

values.label: Movable case: L < 6,15m
values.comment: A movable case with a length less than 6,15 metres.

values.label: Movable case: 6,15m < L < 7,82m
values.comment: A movable case with a length between 6,15 metres and 7,82 metres.

values.label: Movable case: 7,82m < L < 9,15m
values.comment: A movable case with a length between 7,82 metres and 9,15 metres.

values.label: Movable case: 9,15m < L < 10,90m
values.comment: A movable case with a length between 9,15 metres and 10,90 metres.

values.label: Movable case: 10,90m < L < 13,75m
values.comment: A movable case with a length between 10,90 metres and 13,75 metres.

values.label: Totebin
values.comment: A steel open top unit of about 1,5 * 1,5 * 2,5 meters for road transport of bulk cargo.

values.label: Temperature controlled container 20 ft
values.comment: Temperature controlled container measuring 20 feet.

values.label: Temperature controlled container 40 ft
values.comment: A temperature controlled container measuring 40 feet.

values.label: Non working refrigerated (reefer) container 30ft.
values.comment: A 30 foot refrigerated (reefer) container that is not actively cooling the product.

values.label: Dual trailers
values.comment: Two trailers linked together one behind another and pulled by one tractor.

values.label: 20 ft IL container (open top)
values.comment: An open top container that is 20 feet in internal length.

values.label: 20 ft IL container (closed top)
values.comment: A closed top container that is 20 feet in internal length.

values.label: 40 ft IL container (closed top)
values.comment: A closed top container that is 40 feet in internal length.

values.label: Synthetic pallet ISO 1
values.comment: A standard pallet with standard dimensions 80*120cm made of a synthetic material for hygienic reasons.

values.label: Synthetic pallet ISO 2
values.comment: A standard pallet with standard dimensions 100*120cm made of a synthetic material for hygienic reasons.
